title: US says it shot down Iranian drone flying towards aircraft carrier
description: A US military spokesman says the drone was shot down while approaching an American vessel in the Arabian Sea.
content:
An Iranian drone was shot down as it "aggressively approached" an American aircraft carrier in the Arabian Sea on Tuesday, a US military spokesman has said.
An F-35C stealth fighter jet which took off from the USS Abraham Lincoln warship shot down th... [430 chars]

title: West Yorkshire cultural festival funding still unclear
description: Much of the cash for West Yorkshire's Seasons of Culture event is yet to be secured, a report says.
content:
Much of the funding for West Yorkshire's first ever "Seasons of Culture" festival remains unsecured, it has been revealed.
The annual festival was created in the light of Bradford's City of Culture celebrations, with its inaugural edition this year d... [450 chars]

title: Police believe son of Norway’s crown princess sexually assaulted a woman, court hears
description: Marius Borg Høiby, 29, pleads not guilty to four counts of rape in trial that has embarrassed the royal family
content:
Police believe the son of Norway’s crown princess sexually assaulted a woman at an afterparty at a royal residence, a court has heard.
Marius Borg Høiby, 29, pleaded not guilty to four counts of rape on Tuesday, the first day of his trial for multipl... [4187 chars]

title: PepsiCo to cut prices of some snacks after backlash
description: The snack conglomerate is cutting the price of products including Doritos, Cheetos and Lays
content:
PepsiCo is to cut the prices of some of its snack products in the US, following backlash against previous price hikes and pressure in the face of appetite-suppressing GLP-1 jabs.
Products including Doritos, Lays (known as Walkers in the UK) and Cheet... [2518 chars]

title: Coastal road swept away into the sea in Devon
description: South West England was badly hit by storms Goretti, Ingrid and Chandra, which brought heavy rain and flooding last month. The A379 in Devon has been destroyed.
content:
A coastal road that was hit by three named storms has been destroyed after another downpour.
Part of the A379 in Devon, connecting the villages of Torcross and Slapton, near Dartmouth, broke apart overnight, with its sea defences destroyed in January... [1689 chars]
